PrivacyPage.pageDescription: CV Forge stores nothing on our servers. Your data stays in your browser, completely private.
PrivacyPage.privacyFirst: CVForge is a privacy-first resume builder. All of your data stays entirely on your device - nothing is ever sent to our servers.
PrivacyPage.privacyList1: We do not collect, track, or store any personal information.
PrivacyPage.privacyList2: Everything you type is processed locally in your browser.
PrivacyPage.privacyList3: We do not use cookies, analytics, or any third-party scripts that track you.
PrivacyPage.privacyList4: This site is open source and can be audited by anyone for transparency.
PrivacyPage.privacyContact: If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to reach out via the GitHub repository.

TermsPage.termsList2: We are not responsible for how your resumes are used, shared, or interpreted by third parties (like employers).
TermsPage.termsList3: By using CVForge, you agree to use it respectfully and lawfully.
TermsPage.termsFinal: This tool is free, open-source, and created in good faith to help users build better resumes without compromising privacy.
